Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Thetis' Blessing
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
Allows all troops in the world to enter the sea and breathe under water. Fighting below the surface will still be a little awkward for those not used to it, but at least it will be doable.
Poor Amphibian penalty: CS -half, Att -3, Def -3, Enc +1
